casebody.data:
Lula Ford, Administratrix (Estate of Rodney Campbell) v. Kunjathan Thankappen et al. (9752)

Foti, Landau and Freedman, Js.

Argued April 28 decision released May 19, 1992 Bruce W. Diamond, with whom were Richard M. Maraño and, on the brief, Richard D. Casella, for the appellant (plaintiff). Thomas L. Brayton, with whom, on the brief, was Thomas L. Brayton III, for the appellees (defendants). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
